About me Portfolio
09 July 2015

Semantic dependency graph parsing

For a class on semantic dependency graph parsing, I wrote a simple script that computes statistics for semantic dependency graphs. It also generates plots for the distribution of words per indegree and outdegree.

As final project, I submitted a comprehensive review on Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR) – a set of English sentences paired with simple, readable semantic representations.

Til next time,
Melanie
